code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white F aged 66 ys says she is having symptoms of mild recent change in menstrual pattern 3-5 x day, mostly during the day. denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke o:Height 65 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Skin = pallor a:Clotting p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed aspirin - 325 mg daily, and ordered CBC, PT, PTT.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke

td.content: s:a female aged 67 years describes recurrent critical cut on tongue that has been oozing blood from the past day over the past month. The patient reports critical swollen and severe tender right knee, critical easy bruising. o:Height 64 in, Weight 125 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Skin = scattered petechiae, Skin = appears bruised a:Clotting p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:white F aged 67 years presents with critical easy bruising, critical swollen and severe tender right knee, critical cut on tongue that has been oozing blood from the past day and Blood. she is having symptoms 7 x week, in spite of treatment. Patient does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 65 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Skin = scattered petechiae, Skin = appears bruised a:Clotting p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed argatroban - 2 mcg/kg/min IV infusion, and ordered arthroscopic synovectomy - joint.

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
